asgn2Containers
Class FreightContainer

Object
  asgn2Containers.FreightContainer
Direct Known Subclasses:
DangerousGoodsContainer, GeneralGoodsContainer, RefrigeratedContainer
public abstract class FreightContainer
extends Object

This class is used to represent the characteristics of a generic freight, or intermodal, cargo container. All containers that may be loaded onto a ship must be marked with a valid container code and must have a stated gross weight. (The gross weight is the sum of the container's tare and net weights.)

Version:
1.0
Author:
INB370

Constructor Detail

FreightContainer

public FreightContainer(ContainerCode code,
                        Integer grossWeight)
                 throws InvalidContainerException
Constructs a freight container object with the given container code and weight. We assume that the container itself weighs 4 tonnes (the tare weight) and that the maximum gross weight for this kind of container is 30 tonnes. (These figures are consistent with standard 20 foot containers.)

Parameters:
code - the container's code
grossWeight - the container's weight in tonnes
Throws:
InvalidContainerException - if the gross weight is not between 4 and 30 tonnes, inclusive
Method Detail

getCode

public ContainerCode getCode()
Returns the container's code.

Returns:
the code

getGrossWeight

public Integer getGrossWeight()
Returns the container's gross weight.

Returns:
the gross weight (in tonnes)
